response.overview: Dhairya Kumar (Mehul Buch) a renowned and successful Gazal singer has a lovely girlfriend Ritu (Manisha Vora), who is a very ambitious girl and is preparing herself for a Miss Beauty Pageant. Sharmila (Rupa Divetiya) the mother of Dhairya Kumar is very keen that her son gets married. Dhairya Kumar tries to convince Ritu but she refuses as the pageant is approaching.  Sharmila is adamant about her sonâ€™s marriage and therefore goes on a hunger strike. Helpless Dhairya Kumar agrees to get into a contract marriage with Mausami (Sneha Desai) a close friend of Ritu. But destiny plays its own role and in a few days Sharmila dies. With her death start the twists and turns in the play.
response.title: Tame Aavya Ne Ame Favya
